select
distinct
from WHC_ORDER
order by ${orderByClause}

update WHC_ORDER
ORDER_ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMBER_ID = #{record.memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAHOCE_ID = #{record.wahoceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_START_DATE = #{record.startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_END_DATE = #{record.endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_CUSE_MEMO = #{record.cuseMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_AMOUNT = #{record.amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERS_ID = #{record.persId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_TYPE = #{record.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_CREATE_DATE = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_PAY_TYPE = #{record.payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_CUST_MEMO = #{record.custMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_SALE_MEMO = #{record.saleMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_CUST_NAME = #{record.custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_CUST_TEL = #{record.custTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_CUST_ADDR = #{record.custAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_SOURCE = #{record.source,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_ID_NUMBER = #{record.idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_DEPOSIT1 = #{record.deposit1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{record.totalAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_AMOUNT_TYPE = #{record.amountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_TYPE_MOENY = #{record.typeMoeny,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CONTRACT_CODE = #{record.contractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_DEPOSIT_MEMO = #{record.depositMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_DEPOSIT_STATUS = #{record.depositStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_DEPOSITPAY_ACCOUNT = #{record.depositpayAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_REFUND_ACCOUNT = #{record.refundAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_PHONE = #{record.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_EXE_ACCOUNT = #{record.exeAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_DEPOSIT_REMEMO = #{record.depositRememo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_DEPOSIT_RETURN = #{record.depositReturn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_AMOUNT_RETURN = #{record.amountReturn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_OVER_DATE = #{record.overDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_CERT_IMAGE = #{record.certImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_CERT_IMAGE1 = #{record.certImage1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_NEXT_ORDER = #{record.nextOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_NEXT_END_DATE = #{record.nextEndDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_NEXT_AMOUNT = #{record.nextAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_RETURN_CELL_TIME = #{record.returnCellTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_UNIT = #{record.unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_NUMBER = #{record.number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_IS_DISPLAY = #{record.isDisplay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_PASSWORD = #{record.ORDER_PASSWORD,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_TOTAL_TIMES = #{record.totalTimes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update WHC_ORDER
MEMBER_ID = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAHOCE_ID = #{wahoceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_START_DATE = #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_CUSE_MEMO = #{cuseMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERS_ID = #{persId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_PAY_TYPE = #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_CUST_MEMO = #{custMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_SALE_MEMO = #{saleMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_CUST_NAME = #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_CUST_TEL = #{custTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_CUST_ADDR = #{custAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_SOURCE = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_ID_NUMBER = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_DEPOSIT1 = #{deposit1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_AMOUNT_TYPE = #{amountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_TYPE_MOENY = #{typeMoeny,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_CERT_TYPE = #{certType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTRACT_CODE = #{contractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_DEPOSIT_MEMO = #{depositMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_DEPOSIT_STATUS = #{depositStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_DEPOSITPAY_ACCOUNT = #{depositpayAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_REFUND_ACCOUNT = #{refundAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_EXE_ACCOUNT = #{exeAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_DEPOSIT_REMEMO = #{depositRememo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_DEPOSIT_RETURN = #{depositReturn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_AMOUNT_RETURN = #{amountReturn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_OVER_DATE = #{overDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_CERT_IMAGE = #{certImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_CERT_IMAGE1 = #{certImage1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_NEXT_ORDER = #{nextOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_NEXT_END_DATE = #{nextEndDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_NEXT_AMOUNT = #{nextAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_RETURN_CELL_TIME = #{returnCellTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_NUMBER = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_IS_DISPLAY = #{isDisplay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_PASSWORD = #{ORDER_PASSWORD,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_TOTAL_TIMES = #{totalTimes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ORDER_ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update WHC_ORDER set MEMBER_ID = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAHOCE_ID = #{wahoceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_START_DATE = #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_CUSE_MEMO = #{cuseMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERS_ID = #{persId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_PAY_TYPE = #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_CUST_MEMO = #{custMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_SALE_MEMO = #{saleMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_CUST_NAME = #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_CUST_TEL = #{custTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_CUST_ADDR = #{custAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_SOURCE = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_ID_NUMBER = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_DEPOSIT1 = #{deposit1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_AMOUNT_TYPE = #{amountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_TYPE_MOENY = #{typeMoeny,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_CERT_TYPE = #{certType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTRACT_CODE = #{contractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_DEPOSIT_MEMO = #{depositMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_DEPOSIT_STATUS = #{depositStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_DEPOSITPAY_ACCOUNT = #{depositpayAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_REFUND_ACCOUNT = #{refundAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_EXE_ACCOUNT = #{exeAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_DEPOSIT_REMEMO = #{depositRememo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_DEPOSIT_RETURN = #{depositReturn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_AMOUNT_RETURN = #{amountReturn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_OVER_DATE = #{overDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_CERT_IMAGE = #{certImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_CERT_IMAGE1 = #{certImage1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_NEXT_ORDER = #{nextOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_NEXT_END_DATE = #{nextEndDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_NEXT_AMOUNT = #{nextAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_RETURN_CELL_TIME = #{returnCellTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_NUMBER = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_IS_DISPLAY = #{isDisplay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_PASSWORD = #{ORDER_PASSWORD,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_TOTAL_TIMES = #{totalTimes,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ORDER_ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select o.order_id as "id" from whc_order o left join whc_member m on o.member_id = m.member_id left join whc_warehouse_cell wc on wc.wahoce_id = o.wahoce_id left join whc_warehouse wa on wa.waho_id = wc.waho_id where m.open_id = #{openID} and o.order_status='1' and wc.waho_id= #{warehouseId}

select o.order_id as "orderId", w.waho_name as "wahoName", c.wahoce_type as "wahoceType", wt.waty_name as "watyName", c.wahoce_size as "wahoceSize", o.order_status as "status", o.order_cust_tel as "tel", o.order_cust_name as "nickname", m.open_id as "openId", nvl(o.order_total_amount||'','0') as "orderAmount", '0' as "circle", Round(((to_date(o.order_end_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') - to_date(o.order_start_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')))*24,6)||'' as "totalTimes", Round(((to_date(o.order_end_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') - to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')))*24,6)||'' as "remianTimes", o.order_create_date as "createDate", substr(o.order_start_date,1,16) as "orderStartDate", substr(o.order_end_date,1,16) as "orderEndDate", substr(o.order_return_cell_time,1,16) as "orderReturnDate", w.waho_addr as "wahoAddr", c.wahoce_number as "wahoceNumber", o.order_cert_image as "orderCertImage" , o.order_type as "orderType", o.order_next_order as "orderNextOrder", w.waho_type as "wahoType", c.wahoce_kind as "cellkind", (select count(*) from weigate_cabinet_record r1 where r1.order_id=o.order_id)||'' as "OpenCount", o.order_deposit1 as "orderDeposit", o.order_unit as "orderUnit", o.order_number as "orderNumber" from whc_order o left join whc_member m on m.member_id = o.member_id left join bizframe_orgn_person p on p.pers_id = o.pers_id left join whc_warehouse_cell c on c.wahoce_id = o.wahoce_id left join whc_warehouse w on w.waho_id = c.waho_id left join whc_wahoce_type wt on wt.waty_code = c.wahoce_type where o.order_id=#{orderId} and order_is_display='0'

select re.orre_id as "id", substr(re.orre_date,6,11) as "orreDate", re.orre_money as "orreMoney" , re.orre_account_number as "accountNummber" from whc_order_renew re left join whc_order o on o.order_id=re.order_id left join whc_warehouse_cell c on c.wahoce_id=o.wahoce_id left join whc_warehouse w on w.waho_id=c.waho_id where w.waho_type='1' and re.order_id=#{orderId} and re.orre_account_number is not null

select temp."orderId" as "orderId", temp."wahoceId" as "wahoceId", m.open_id as "openId", temp."orderStartDate" as "orderStartDate", temp."orderCreateDate" as "orderCreateDate", temp."orderEndDate" as "orderEndDate", temp."orderTotalAmount" as "orderTotalAmount", temp."orderDeposit" as "orderDeposit", temp."orderStatus" as "orderStatus", temp."orderTotalHour" as "orderTotalHour", temp."orderType" as "orderType", temp."orderNextOrder" as "orderNextOrder", temp."order_cert_image" as "orderCertImage", wc.wahoce_type as "waceType", wc.wahoce_number as "waceNumber", wt.waty_name as "waceName", w.waho_id as "wahoId", w.waho_name as "wahoName", w.waho_addr as "wahoAddr", w.waho_type as "wahoType", w.waho_adv1 as "adv1", w.waho_adv2 as "adv2", w.waho_adv3 as "adv3", wp.watypr_half_price as "waceHalfPrice", wp.watypr_month_price as "waceMonthPrice", wp.watypr_day_price as "waceDayPrice", wp.watypr_time_price as "waceTimePrice", wc.wahoce_size as "waceSize", wp.watypr_month_price as "monthPrice", wp.watypr_half_price as "halfPrice", temp."nextEndDate" as "nextEndDate", temp."nextAmount" as "nextAmount", temp."retrunCellTime" as "retrunCellTime", temp."name" as "name", temp."tel" as "tel", temp."number" as "number", temp."unit" as "unit", temp."ordertotaltimes" as "ordertotaltimes"
from ( select o.order_id as "orderId", o.member_id as "memberId", o.order_status as "orderStatus", o.wahoce_id as "wahoceId", o.order_start_date as "orderStartDate", o.order_end_date as "orderEndDate", o.order_create_date as "orderCreateDate", nvl(o.order_total_amount,o.order_amount) as "orderTotalAmount", o.order_deposit1 as "orderDeposit", o.order_type as "orderType", o.order_cert_image as "order_cert_image", o.order_next_order as "orderNextOrder", Round(((to_date(o.order_end_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') - to_date(o.order_start_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')))*24,6)||'' as "orderTotalHour", o.order_next_end_date as "nextEndDate", o.order_next_amount as "nextAmount", o.order_return_cell_time as "retrunCellTime", o.order_cust_name as "name", o.order_cust_tel as "tel", o.order_number as "number", o.order_unit as "unit", o.ORDER_Total_Times as "ordertotaltimes" from whc_order o where o.order_id =#{orderId} ) temp left join whc_warehouse_cell wc on wc.wahoce_id = temp."wahoceId" left join whc_wahoce_type_price wp on wc.wahoce_type = wp.waty_id and wc.waho_id = wp.waho_id left join whc_wahoce_type wt on wc.wahoce_type = wt.waty_code left join whc_warehouse w on wc.waho_id = w.waho_id left join whc_member m on m.member_id = temp."memberId"

select o.order_id as "id", o.member_id as "memberId", o.order_id as "orderId", o.order_pay_type as "payType", o.order_amount as "amount", o.order_type as "type", o.order_status as "status", o.order_create_date as "createDate", o.order_start_date as "startDate", o.order_end_date as "endDate", o.order_cust_memo as "customerMemo", o.order_cuse_memo as "customerServiceMemo", o.order_sale_memo as "saleMemo", o.pers_id as "personId", o.order_start_date||'~'||o.order_end_date as "circle", case when o.order_id is null then null else Round( (to_date(o.order_end_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') - to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')),0)||'' end as "remian", o.order_cust_memo||chr(10)||o.order_cuse_memo||chr(10)||o.order_sale_memo as "memo" from whc_order o left join whc_warehouse_cell c on o.wahoce_id = c.wahoce_id left join whc_warehouse w on w.waho_id=c.waho_id where (#{status} is null or o.order_status =#{status}) and c.wahoce_type!='8' and w.waho_type!='1'
